artefactsOfPower.name: Celestium Burst-grenade
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: Typically used by the Grundstok ‘black marines’, this specialised anti-ethereal weapon can nullify magical wards.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Blazebeard and Sons 'Drakk-Hobbler' Mag-Bolas
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Shooting or Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This patented device can entwine monstrous foes, impeding their advance to allow more firepower to be brought to bear upon them.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy ****MONSTER**** within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making **charge** rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

artefactsOfPower.name: Voidstone Orb
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability for a WIZARD within 30" of this unit
artefactsOfPower.lore: This small, unassuming black globe contains the power to disrupt enemy spells.

battleTraits.name: Ply the Skies
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a non-CHARGE MOVE ability for an Arkanaut Frigate
battleTraits.lore: The Kharadron rule the skies of the realms with fleets of fearsome airships crewed by hardened duardin.
battleTraits.usedBy: The **Arkanaut Frigate** that is using that **MOVE** ability.
battleTraits.effect: Pick a friendly ****INFANTRY**** unit that is wholly within the combat range of that **Arkanaut Frigate** and not in combat to be transported. Remove that ****INFANTRY**** unit from the battlefield. Then, when the **Arkanaut Frigate** ends its **move**, set up the ****INFANTRY**** unit on the battlefield again, wholly within the combat range of the **Arkanaut Frigate** and not in combat. A unit cannot use ****CHARGE**** abilities if it was transported in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Flying High
battleTraits.lore: Often one skyvessel will hold back high above the battlefield, only to descend and deploy additional troops where and when they are most needed.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly ****SKYVESSEL**** that is part of a regiment from which no units have been deployed, then pick a number of units up to its Transport Capacity (see its warscroll) that are in its regiment.
battleTraits.effect: Set up all of those units in reserve **in the clouds**. They have now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Descend from the Clouds
battleTraits.lore: As a skyvessel swoops down to the battlefield, its Kharadron passengers scramble to disembark and storm the battlefield
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly ****SKYVESSEL** in the clouds** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that ****SkYVESSEL**** anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up all other units that were set up **in the clouds** with that ****SKYVESSEL**** wholly within 6" of it and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Skyvessel Cover
battleTraits.lore: With a mighty skyvessel floating above providing covering fire, Kharadron Overlords are much harder to target.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly **KHARADRON OVERLORDS **INFANTRY**** units while they are wholly within 6" of a friendly **Arkanaut** **Ironclad** or **Arkanaut** **Frigate**.

battleTraits.name: Transport Skyfarers
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a non-CHARGE MOVE ability for a friendly SKYVESSEL
battleTraits.lore: The Kharadron rule the skies of the realms with fleets of fearsome airships crewed by hardened duardin.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick a number of units up to that ****SKYVESSEL****’s Transport Capacity (see its warscroll) that are wholly within 6" of it to be the targets. Units that have been transported this turn cannot be targets.

Remove the targets from the battlefield. After the ****SKYVESSEL**** ends its **move**, you must set up each target unit on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of that ****SKYVESSEL**** and not in combat. Those units have been transported. A unit cannot use ****CHARGE**** abilities if it was transported in the same turn.

heroicTraits.name: Endrinmaestro
heroicTraits.lore: This leader’s knowledge of the intricacies of Kharadron firearms design is unrivalled.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 2" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **KHARADRON OVERLORDS **INFANTRY**** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Grudgebearer
heroicTraits.lore: This leader never forgets a slight, biding their time until they can take revenge.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Double the Damage characteristic of this unit’s weapons for attacks that target that enemy unit for the rest of the battle.

heroicTraits.name: Cunning Fleetmaster
heroicTraits.lore: This wily skyfarer never does what the enemy expects.
heroicTraits.effect: Each time a friendly ****SKYVESSEL**** wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, roll 2 dice and use the highest result when determining the distance that unit can **move**.

spearheadEnhancements.name: There's No Reward Without Risk
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability for a unit wholly within 12" of your general
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Under the command of their Admiral, the crew close in on their prize without a moment’s hesitation.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: You can re-roll the **charge** roll for that ****CHARGE**** ability.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Masterwrought Armour
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Admiral’s finely crafted suit of armour is the acme of the armourer’s art.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Leave No Duardin Behind
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: With a rousing speech, the Admiral rallies his crew and steels their resolve.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly **Arkanaut Company** unit wholly within 12" of your general and roll a dice for each slain model from that unit.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: For each 4+, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Flask of Vintage Gorogna
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This rare duardin drink is said to be good for whatever ails you.

regimentAbilities.name: Disengage
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: At an officer’s command, the vessel disengages with all guns blazing.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Arkanaut Frigate** to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: If that unit uses a ****RETREAT**** ability this phase, no mortal damage is inflicted on it and it can still use ****SHOOT**** abilities later in the turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Assault Boat
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: The speed and manoeuvrability of the Arkanaut Frigate allows it to deliver Arkanaut Companies directly into the fray.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that was **transported** this turn to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: That unit can still use ****CHARGE**** abilities later in the turn.

regimentOfRenown.name: Swoop In
regimentOfRenown.lore: Once the moment is right, Gronn and his crew strike hard and fast.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick the **Grundstok Gunhauler** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability if it is **studying the battlefield**.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Set up the **Grundstok Gunhauler** on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units that have an artefact of power and more than 9" from all other enemy units. Then, set up all other units in this Regiment of Renown wholly within 3" of the **Grundstok Gunhauler** and more than 6" from all enemy units.

regimentOfRenown.name: An Eye For Loot
regimentOfRenown.lore: The Exile Scavengers observe from above to locate the best spot to swoop in and ‘claim their fee’.
regimentOfRenown.declare: This ability must be used to **deploy** this Regiment of Renown.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Set up the units in this Regiment of Renown in reserve **studying the battlefield**. They have now been deployed.

regimentOfRenown.name: What's Yours Is Mine
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: Gronn has always had a cavalier attitude when it comes to ownership.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with a unit in this Regiment of Renown to be the target. Then, pick an artefact of power the target has.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll for each unit in this Regiment of Renown that is in combat with the target. On a 6+, the target no longer has that artefact of power.

abilities.name: Meticulously Maintained
abilities.lore: Iron Sky Attack Squadrons make up the main fighting force of each sky-port; no expense is spared in their upkeep, in the anticipation that they will bear the brunt of the enemy’s attacks.
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to each friendly **SKYVESSEL** in each phase.

abilities.name: Grudgesettler Protocols
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: Grundstok marines have been trained to apply such overwhelming pressure that their targets do not even get a chance to fight back.
abilities.effect: Add 3" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **Grundstok Thunderers** and **Grundstok** **Gunhaulers** units for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fastest Vessels in the Fleet
abilities.lore: The expert navigators of the Aetherrunners can outmanoeuvre any enemy that challenges their mastery of the skies.
abilities.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of all friendly **SKYVESSELS**.

abilities.name: Special Procurement
abilities.lore: The mechanically minded Endrineers Guild often charter fleets to form expeditionary forces equipped with the most advanced inventions in the Mortal Realms.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE KHARADRON OVERLORDS HERO** that does not have an artefact of power.
abilities.effect:
Give that **HERO** 1 artefact of power from the ‘Inventions of the Sky‑ports’.

**Designer’s Note:** *This artefact of power is given to the unit during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*
